EmailTemplate.name: Non-CA status check - no quest. recvd.
EmailTemplate.subject: Non-CA status check - no quest. recvd.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your inquiry.
Unfortunately, we are unable to prepare your claim documents until we receive your completed questionnaire. We are re-sending the questionnaire for your convenience. Please complete it and return it via e-mail, fax at (323) 446-8479, or mail to:
LegalZoom.com, Inc. Attn: Small Claims 101 N. Brand Blvd., 10th Floor Glendale, CA 91203
Once we receive the completed questionnaire, we will prepare all of your court forms and send them to you with detailed instructions on how to file your claim.
If you have any further questions, please simply reply to this email, or feel free to call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
